about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Welcome to vidtools.tools
about.who_we_are_desc1: vidtools.tools is a free platform designed for video creators and editors. We provide simple and practical tools to help YouTubers, filmmakers, and content creators improve their work efficiency.
about.who_we_are_desc2: All our tools are safe, free to use, and continuously updated.
about.mission_goal1: Make video editing simpler and faster
about.mission_goal2: Provide free tools that anyone can use
about.image_processing_desc: Smart image scaling, format conversion, compression optimization, batch processing
about.screenshot_tools_desc: Full screen, area, window, and delayed screenshots
about.video_processing_desc: Format conversion, subtitle editing, audio extraction, video compression
about.efficient_desc: No registration required, offline use, simple interface, easy operation
about.free_desc: All tools are free to use, no paid subscriptions required
about.secure_desc: Tools run completely locally, no data sent to servers, protecting your privacy and data security
about.updated_desc: We constantly improve and add new features
about.user_friendly_desc: Simple interface design suitable for users of all skill levels
about.contact_desc: If you have suggestions or feedback, please contact us:
about.contact_feedback: We value every user's feedback and will carefully consider your suggestions to improve our services.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're ready to help you anytime
contact.need_help_desc: Whether you have technical questions, feature suggestions, or want to learn about our services, we welcome your contact. We promise to reply to your message within 24 hours.
contact.email_desc: This is the most direct way to contact us, suitable for all types of questions and feedback.
contact.feedback_desc: We highly value user feedback, and your suggestions will help us improve our products.
contact.feedback_detail: Please describe your ideas in detail, and we will carefully consider and reply to you.
contact.technical_desc: Problems or errors encountered while using tools
contact.suggestions_desc: New features you'd like to see or improvement suggestions
contact.guidance_desc: Need more detailed instructions or tutorials
contact.other_desc: Any questions related to our services
contact.before_contact_desc: To help you solve problems faster, we recommend providing the following information when contacting:
contact.tool_name: Name of the tool you're using
contact.problem_desc: Specific description of the problem encountered

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.welcome_desc: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information security.
privacy.info_collection_desc: We do not collect personally identifiable information from users. Our tools can only be downloaded for local use, run completely on your computer, do not send any data to our servers, and we do not track your activities outside this website.
privacy.cookies_desc1: This website may use Google AdSense and Google Analytics, which may place cookies on your device to display personalized ads.
privacy.cookies_desc2: You can opt out of personalized ads by visiting
privacy.cookies_desc3: to opt out of personalized advertising.
privacy.data_security_desc: We do not store personal data. Our tools run completely locally, all file processing is done on your computer, and no data is uploaded to any server. Your data is completely under your control.
privacy.children_privacy_desc: Our services are not directed to children under 13 years of age.
privacy.contact_desc: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.welcome_desc: By using our website and tools, you agree to the following terms:
terms.service_use_desc1: Our tools are for personal and non-commercial use only, unless otherwise stated.
terms.service_use_desc2: You agree not to abuse our services, such as attempting to hack, reverse engineer, or overload our website.
terms.intellectual_property_desc1: All content, brands, and original software provided on this website remain the property of vidtools.tools.
terms.intellectual_property_desc2: You may not copy, distribute, or resell our tools without permission.
terms.disclaimer_desc1: Our services are provided 'as is' without any form of warranty.
terms.disclaimer_desc2: We do not guarantee uninterrupted, error-free operation or compatibility with all systems.
terms.liability_desc1: vidtools.tools is not responsible for any data loss, damage, or problems arising from the use of our tools.
terms.liability_desc2: Our tools run completely locally and do not send any data to servers. Users are responsible for backing up their files.
terms.third_party_desc: We may display third-party advertisements (such as Google AdSense). We are not responsible for the content of these ads.
terms.terms_changes_desc: We may update these terms of service from time to time. Continued use of our services means you accept any changes.
terms.contact_desc: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact:

creator: Creator

available_effects: Available effects (enter numbers, comma separated, e.g. 1,3,5)
historical_style: Historical style: 10,13,14 (Sepia + Grain + Scratches) - Historical, vintage feel
scientific_style: Scientific style: 2,11,12 (Zoom Out + Cold Blue + B&W) - Rational, objective, technical
mystery_style: Mystery style: 1,7,10 (Zoom In + Rotate + Sepia) - Attention-grabbing, suspenseful
psychological_style: Psychological style: 3,8,10 (Pan Right + Flip + Sepia) - Memory confusion, cognitive bias
exploration_style: Exploration style: 1,5,6 (Zoom In + Pan Up + Pan Down) - Discovery, exploration feel
high_energy_style: High Energy style: 1,7 (Zoom In + Rotate) - Emphasize key points, dramatic tension
important_turning: Important turning point ‚Üí High Energy style
